name: EtherFi
description: EtherFi is a liquid staking protocol with $3.26B+ TVL. Operation Solo Staker program offers zero-bond entry for accepted applicants using DVT (Obol for Solo Stakers, SSV for professional operators) to eliminate slashing risk. 40+ operators across multiple cohorts.

docsIntegration.text: Documentation at https://etherfi.gitbook.io/ covering staking, node operation, and Operation Solo Staker program
Uses Obol DVT for Solo Stakers and SSV for professional operators. EigenLayer restaking activated October 15, 2025.
ETHFI Season 2 active with $7M buyback program. 5% operator share on 10-15 validators with quarterly payouts.

opportunities.entryDescription: Requires 2 ETH bond - no application or KYC needed

notes: Operators earn standard staking rewards plus EigenLayer restaking rewards through eETH value accrual.

opportunities.entryDescription: Requires application, KYC, technical competence verification, and 2-year commitment

notes: EtherFi provides full 32 ETH per validator.
Can provide hardware via 2-year payment plan or bring your own.
Operators earn 5% of rewards across 10-15 validators.
Uses Obol DVT for slashing protection.
